channel.title: Is 5Gbps.com VPS hosting with DDoS protection viable for a server?
channel.description:
[url=https://5gbps.com/ddos-protected-vps.php]https://5gbps.com/ddos-protected-vps.php[/url]
Looking at plan 2 or 3 for running a DayZ style zombie survivor game using the RSC game engine with all new content made from scratch. What do you guys think about this host and what they offer? So far it all looks legit. 200Gbps DDoS filtering against 20Gbps DDoS attacks is great if it works. Thoughts?

item.title: Is 5Gbps.com VPS hosting with DDoS protection viable for a server?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

It’s a reseller of Voxility(At least so I’ve heard) which is pretty good.

Read full topic
item.source: Is 5Gbps.com VPS hosting with DDoS protection viable for a server?

item.title: Is 5Gbps.com VPS hosting with DDoS protection viable for a server?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Justin Bieber:

no, you need at least 8000Gbit with a fully loaded springback 4J instance on standby.

Thats enough, Justine Bieber.

Read full topic
